actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 212(b) of the Immigration and Nationality Act to exempt from the literacy requirement of section 212(a)(25) certain additional relatives of U.S. citizens and permanent resident aliens.

summary.text: Exempts from the literacy requirement provisions for admission to the United States under the Immigration and Nationality Act, the citizens and permanent resident aliens.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 212(b) of the Immigration and Nationality Act to exempt from the literacy requirement of section 212(a)(25) certain additional relatives of U.S. citizens and permanent resident aliens.
